tool_description: Searches historical fire incident data for the property and surrounding area to identify patterns and risks.

search_radius_miles.description: Search radius for area incidents (0.1 to 5.0 miles)

years_back.description: Number of years of historical data to search

error_messages: Invalid address: Provide complete street address for accurate location search.
Search radius error: Radius must be between 0.1 and 5.0 miles.
Years back error: Must be between 1 and 50 years.
No historical data: No fire incident data available for specified location and timeframe.
usage: Provide property_address for the assessment location. Optionally adjust search_radius_miles and years_back to control scope of historical analysis.

property_fire_history.description: Fire incidents at the specific property

area_fire_frequency.description: Average fires per year in the surrounding area

common_fire_causes.description: Most common fire causes in the area
